TextLibrary.Text: Travel to Fornax Prime to meet with Cytech.
You must be at least Neutral with Cytech.
You must be at most Neutral with Trident.
Purchase an NPG from Fornax Epsilon.
You have the device to weaken the Turrets
Use the NPG at Fornax Port.
You do not have enough Credits
Destroy the first half of the Turret on Fornax Port.
Destroy the rest of the Turret on Fornax Port.
Enemy Mechanism destroyed -- Return to Fornax Prime
Return to Fornax Prime for your reward.
